description: Bytether (pronounce as byte-ther) is a 1:1 cross-fork of the Bitcoin blockchain onto the Ethereum network at block 478,558 (Same as Bitcoin Cash). Any Bitcoin holder who has 1 BTC at block 478,558 can claim for 1 BTH(Bytether). Bytether’s sole focus is building a greater payment ecosystem. As an ERC20 token, Bytether takes all advantages of Ethereum blockchain technology with faster transaction time and cheaper transaction fee while maintaining currency characteristics of Bitcoin.
name: Bytether
